com.foxhole.tools.spartan.spaces
Class LogicalGameSpace

java.lang.Object
  com.foxhole.tools.spartan.spaces.LogicalGameSpace
All Implemented Interfaces:
INonRenderableSpartanObject, ISpartanObject, IGameSpaceObject
public class LogicalGameSpace
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameSpaceObject

The logical gamespace is an entity oriented implementation of a gamespace. This gamespace will only serve to hold entities and its logic part, hence the logic part of the name.

Author:
FoxholeStudios

          Creates a new logical game space
